'''Pale Red Crab''' is a type of crab that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Crab|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Pale Red Crabs are mainly found in [[Inazuma]], with over 50 of them being on [[Seirai Island]].

See the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=275 Official Interactive Map] for specific locations.
